STEPS:

1) navigate to this directory on your Mac
2) run "bundle exec jekyll serve --watch"
3) make changes in files on Mac and check updates at "http://127.0.0.1:4000" or whatever the link is that day
4) then open terminal in this directory and run "git status" to see what you've changed
5) then run "git add ."
6) then run "git commit -m 'msg...'"
7) then run "git push -u origin main" and do this https://ginnyfahs.medium.com/github-error-authentication-failed-from-command-line-3a545bfd0ca8
